SELECT oli.oli_no, title, content, oli.reg_date, name, img_path, price, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no),0) star_avg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_like oll WHERE oll.oli_no = oli.oli_no) like_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no) reply_cnt FROM online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_teacher olt, online_lecture_tag oltag
GROUP BY oli.oli_no
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
ORDER BY like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY reply_cnt DESC
ORDER BY star_avg DESC
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
